setQueueWeight

public void setQueueWeight(IPNIC nic,
                           int weight)
sets the weight of queues, used when a weighted algorithm is used. Example Nic A = 1 Nic B = 4 For every 5 bits of service, A would get one, B would get 4.

Parameters:
nic - the nic queue to set the weight of
weight - the weight of the queue
